tool_name: Free Phone Number Lookup and Validation API
tool_description: This API allows users to perform free lookups and validations of phone numbers, providing additional information such as geographic location, timezone, and currency without requiring any signup.

api_list.name: Free JSON Endpoint
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves information about a phone number, including validation and additional details. For more information, please refer to the documentation at https://phone-number-api.com/docs/json.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The phone number to be looked up and validated.
